title: The Sims FreePlay v5.20.2 (Mod Money/LP/Social Points)

LET THE FREEPLAY BEGIN! CREATE UP TO 31 CUSTOMIZED SIMS FROM HEAD TO TOE, ANDâ€¦
- Design dream homes complete with swimming pools and multiple stories

- Visit your real friendsâ€™ Sim Towns! Complete goals, form new relationships and compare your friendsâ€™ interior design skills against yours!
- Care for pets, grow gardens, even bake a cake
- Give your Sims careers and earn Simoleons to improve their situations
- Complete goals for Lifestyle Points, then spend them on hip items
- Live with your Sims in real-time (when itâ€™s day or night for you, itâ€™s the same for your Sims)!
â€¦and most of all, play for FREE!
MORE SIM-ULATING POSSIBILITIES
Will your Sims be friends â€“ or enemies? Form relationships with a slap, a high-five, or some Woohoo! Make your town bustle with pet stores, car dealerships, and supermarkets. Expand your city as you get more Sims.
Be free, Sims! Be free! The opportunities are limitless!

Whats' new:
